doc.previous: The reflection (c' ) of a vector c along a vector m, or equivalently in the hyperplane orthogonal to m, is the same as negating the component of a vector parallel to m. The result of the reflection will be
doc.after: This is not the most general operation that may be regarded as a reflection when the dimension n â¥ 4. A general reflection may be expressed as the composite of any odd number of single-axis reflections. Thus, a general reflection (a' ) of a vector a may be written
